summary: The tale of Bardock, the father of Goku, and his rebellion against his master the mighty Frieza.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Kazuyuki Sogabe|Yûko Mita|Takeshi Watabe|Kôzô Shioya|Ryûsei Nakao|Show Hayami|Yukitoshi Hori|Banjô Ginga|Kinpei Azusa|Ryô Horikawa|Shôzô Îzuka|Hirohiko Kakegawa|Yûji Machi|Chie Satô|Shinobu Satouchi|Michio Nakao|Jôji Yanami|Sonny Strait|Linda Young|Christopher Sabat|Chris Forbis|Stephanie Nadolny|Sean Schemmel|Mike McFarland|John Burgmeier|Bart Myer|Ceyli Delgadillo|Chris Rager|Chuck Huber|Dale Kelly|Dameon Clarke|Justin Cook|Kyle Hebert|Mark Britten|Paul Bandey|Chris Cason|Jodi Forrest|David Gasman|Sharon Mann|Edward Marcus|Yûsuke Numata|Phil Parsons|Doug Rand|Kenji Utsumi|Kent Williams
title: Dragon Ball Z: El último combate
